data.Enrique Whisnant:
Although the cause of death  was reported as pneumonia, Enrique, a 25-year-old semi-professional sports person, is convinced that his late girlfriend, Laura Wheeler, was murdered.

He is a British Christian. He started studying sports science at college but never finished the course.

Physically, Enrique is in pretty good shape. He is very short with dark skin, black hair and brown eyes.

He grew up in a working class neighbourhood. Having never really known his parents, he was raised in a series of foster homes.

He is currently single. His most recent romance was with a student called Laura Wheeler, who was the same age as him. Laura died in 2018. The papers reported the cause of death: 'pneumonia'

Enrique's best friend is a semi-professional sports person called Tatiana Graves. They are inseparable. He also hangs around with Kiaran Mathew and Jackson Rowe. They enjoy binge-watching boxed sets together.

personality.Hobbies: football, planking, walking, binge-watching boxed sets, theatre, recycling, interviewing suspects, listening to music, worship, watching television, looking for clues

background.Early years: Enrique grew up in an impoverished neighbourhood. Having never really known his parents, he was raised in a series of foster homes.
background.Formative years: Enrique got his first job as a golf caddy at age 16. Enrique started college but quit part way through the course.
background.Most traumatic childhood experience: His mother leaving when he was two.

kiaran_mathew.Relationship: They have a very firey friendship

jackson_rowe.Relationship: They get on well most of the time

nabila_fowler.Relationship: Enrique and Nabila grew up together. Nevertheless, they are not particularly close.

deborah_whisnant.Relationship: Enrique and Deborah spent a lot of time together before their father walked out on Enrique's mum but contact dwindled after that.

ashley_netta_rice.Reason for breakup: Ashley wanted to be with somebody more vibrant

timeline.2010: Starts work at Yellowstone Country Club at golf caddy
timeline.2012: Gets together with Ashley Netta Rice
timeline.2013: Relationship with Ashley Netta Rice ends (Ashley wanted to be with somebody more vibrant)
timeline.2014: Gets together with Alishia Lynsey Conrad. Resigns from job as golf caddy at Yellowstone Country Club. Starts work at B Fit at gym assistant
timeline.2015: Relationship with Alishia Lynsey Conrad ends (Alishia was bored)
timeline.2017: Gets together with Laura Wheeler. Resigns from job as gym assistant at B Fit. Starts at City Team as a semi-professional sports person
